title: Can Vedic Knowledge be Proven by Modern Science? | Sri Satya Gaura Chandra Dasa
speaker: HG Satya Gaura Chandra Dasa

segments.key_quote: When any Vedic statement is made, that itself is an evidence. There is no need of any proof.
segments.summary: The speaker argues that Vedic knowledge, originating from Vyasadeva, doesn't require external scientific proof because it is inherently complete and consistent, unlike fields like mathematics.
